description: This file defines a Flutter widget class 'DietPage' which represents a UI page for the diet module, displaying a simple centered card with the text 'Diet module'.

classes.name: DietPage
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the diet page UI with a centered card displaying 'Diet module'.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the diet page, including a Center widget with a Card containing styled text.
